conversations.content: How many appointments do I have today?

<function_thought>
To determine the number of appointments Emma has today, I first need to retrieve the current date. After that, I'll fetch the calendar events for that specific date to count the appointments. 
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_current_day()]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
